title: change email
body: i deleted the email on my main account. i want to chagne it to my current email but i cant get the code beacuse they send the code to my deleted email. any help is appreciated

replies.body: Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). If you can go ahead and verify yourself as the original creator they should be able to help out with this on our end.
